channel.title: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to PietyPk [317 PI]
http://piety-pk.webs.com/
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dirbLxiEW1w&feature=c4-overview&list=UU_Cij1XyY85PBkxm8zUe_dA[/youtube]
i have been working on this project for the last couple of weeks and many mates and asked me to release this to the online world! Piety-Pk is a much loved project now going to be hosted online for you players to enjoy feel free to go to the website and use the webclient or client download to enjoy your gameplay!
We are only currently hosting the website on a .webs temp for players to use until we have created a real html & css website.
here are some of the features we have in pietypk
[/b] [code]A Agility Shop with interfaces for tickets. Working Banktabs Summoning quest to level up summoning Working Auras in-game Fixing Minigames Eco Recoding Better Combat Full Screen Client Audio Sounds Temp Staff Working MoneyPouch! dupe in the MoneyPouch Drop Dupe Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server] Announcement when you get 99 LevelPoints with a Store custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim 100% Timed mute 100% Timed Ban Smithing (x5, x10) 120 Dungeoneering The Arrow Dupe Glitch Server AutoSave Lag when banking all Player Titles Auto-Server Save UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable) SOF InterFace KillStreak Point System Made KS give you extra PK Points Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally messed up on v1) Custom Npc Shops Added in dice command for Donator+ New Interfaces Fixed Crowns in Pc, Pm, and chat Admins and Owners dont share same crowns Comp Cape requireing all 99s. Zoom in and Zoom out feature New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank Better Duel Arena New ::Help method Better Prayer Better Eco Vote point shop Tokkul Shop 2b Ticket Exchange New member rank timedmute timedban SollyStore Nice Player ritles With a good Interface Player Titles for most ranks Player Cliping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones) Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Made a lot of things Fixed Freezing in Wise old man New staff capes And LOADS OF MORE THINGS![/code] [/center]

item.title: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:8, topic:538195”]Every server has to start somewhere ;D
As soon as you improve your server and make it unique and fun the word will spread. Or simply advertise in appropriate places. Good luck too

EDIT:

Found more bugs:

  • Using prayers doesn’t decrease prayer , lol? infinite prayer.
  • Anti-fire potion doesn’t work , and when trying to drink it it always stays at 4 doses yet it always says there are 3 out of 4 doses left.[/quote]

ok thanks dude applying the fixes now and going to update later i might purchase a domain aswell…

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!

item.title: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

Every server has to start somewhere ;D
As soon as you improve your server and make it unique and fun the word will spread. Or simply advertise in appropriate places. Good luck too

EDIT:

Found more bugs:

  • Using prayers doesn’t decrease prayer , lol? infinite prayer.
  • Anti-fire potion doesn’t work , and when trying to drink it it always stays at 4 doses yet it always says there are 3 out of 4 doses left.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!

item.title: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:6, topic:538195”][quote author=haviland4 link=topic=657020.msg4395636#msg4395636 date=1389035044]

Good luck. Haha.


My luck has been bad no one is joining im uploading a video about pietypk now and uploading some photos for this thread…
come on guys join join join!
[/quote]

thanks dude i will start working on this right away! i have no idea how i can gain players anyway

I actually joined and seems like a nice server , expect for a few bugs i noticed and some things need to be edited.

  • When wearing a cape with the dragon platebody you can see it through the cape.
  • The exp rates are really too high , i got maxed a few stats in less than 15 minutes.
  • 100m Starter wasnt a good idea , and since leveling is easy you get 99 thieving really easily therfore making too much money in just few minutes.
    -When trying to change hitmarks in options it doesn’t work the same hitmark is kept.
  • The current HP bar is not too good , it just doesn’t fit in neither look good.
  • You should try fixing the attack animations of monsters. The walking is good.

Thats it so far , i hope you use my feedback to improve your server for the better ;)[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!

item.title: [317 PI] PietyPk 24-7 Release Date:06/01/2014. Much Loved Project!
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:5, topic:538195”][quote author=runekeepthug link=topic=657020.msg4395612#msg4395612 date=1389029034]
Good luck. Haha.
[/quote]

My luck has been bad no one is joining im uploading a video about pietypk now and uploading some photos for this thread…
come on guys join join join![/quote]

I actually joined and seems like a nice server , expect for a few bugs i noticed and some things need to be edited.

  • When wearing a cape with the dragon platebody you can see it through the cape.
  • The exp rates are really too high , i got maxed a few stats in less than 15 minutes.
  • 100m Starter wasnt a good idea , and since leveling is easy you get 99 thieving really easily therfore making too much money in just few minutes.
    -When trying to change hitmarks in options it doesn’t work the same hitmark is kept.
  • The current HP bar is not too good , it just doesn’t fit in neither look good.
  • You should try fixing the attack animations of monsters. The walking is good.

Thats it so far , i hope you use my feedback to improve your server for the better

Read full topic
